titleStmt.title: A letter from the Right Honourable Robert Earle of VVarwicke, Lord High-admirall of England: to the speaker of the House of Peeres. VVith an exact diurnall of all the most speciall and remarkable passages which have hapned during the siege of Lyme in Dorsetshire by Pr. Maurice his forces, from the 21 of February to this present. Die Jovis, 10 Junii, 1644. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that the L. Admirals letter, with the diurnall concerning Lime be forthwith printed and published. J. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: Warwick, Robert Rich, Earl of, 1587-1658.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright in the Old-baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
